price: 12. (Jie sakys): „Mūsų Viešpatie, pašalink nuo mūsų kančią, tikrai mes tapsime tikinčiaisiais.“
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
